ARABIC: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِى ٱلْقُبُورِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Does he not know that when the graves are emptied out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Does he not know when the contents of the graves are laid bare
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Is he not aware that when whatever lies (buried) in the graves is overthrown;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Does he not know that on the day when those in the graves are resurrected
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So does he not know? When those in the graves are raised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Knows he not that when the contents of the graves are poured forth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Does he not then know when what is in the graves is raised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Knows he not that when that which is in the tombs is over-thrown,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Knoweth he not that, when the contents of the graves are poured forth
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Is he not aware of the time when the contents of the graves will be brought out?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Knoweth he not - when that which is in the graves, shall be ransacked?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Does he not know, when what is [buried] in the graves is turned over,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Does he not know,- when that which is in the graves is scattered abroad
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Knows he not that when the contents of the graves are brought out and poured forth (all mankind is resurrected).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Does he not know that when that which is in the graves is overthrown,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Does he not know? When the contents of the graves are scattered around.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But does he not know that when the contents of the graves are scattered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [100:9] Does he not know that, when that which is in the graves, in the way of the dead, is strewn, when it is turned over and brought out, that is to say, [that when] they are raised,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Knoweth he not) i.e. Abu Hubahib; and it is also said: Qurt (that, when the contents of the graves) the dead (are poured forth
